messages.content:
Subject: Invitation to discuss Media Ethics on the "Media Matters" podcast

Hi John,

I’m Alex Rivera, host of the "Media Matters" podcast where we explore the biggest challenges facing modern journalism. Our listeners are deeply interested in media ethics and press freedom, as reflected in recent audience data showing strong engagement with those topics.

Given your 40‑year career championing press accountability and your recent piece "Press Freedom in the 21st Century" (https://dailychronicle.org/articles/press-freedom-2023), I believe you would be the perfect guest for our upcoming episode titled "Media Ethics: Navigating Truth in the Digital Age."

We’d love to hear your insights on how journalists can uphold ethical standards amid misinformation, digital platforms, and evolving public expectations. The episode would be recorded remotely at a time convenient for you and typically runs about 45 minutes.

Would you be open to joining us? I’m happy to work around your schedule and provide any additional details you need.

Thank you for considering the invitation – I look forward to the possibility of featuring your expertise on the show.

Best regards,
Alex Rivera
Host, Media Matters
alex@mediamatterspod.com
I've drafted the email above. Let me know if you'd like any edits or if you want me to send it on your behalf.
